##model gemini-2.5-pro##

python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend gemini \
  --model gemini-2.5-pro \
  --regime forced \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --repeat_fakes 1 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --note_order shuffle \
  --out_jsonl out/gemini_25pro_taskB_forced_r1.jsonl

python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend gemini \
  --model gemini-2.5-pro \
  --regime forced \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --repeat_fakes 4 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --note_order shuffle \
  --out_jsonl gemini_25pro_taskB_forced_r4.jsonl


python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend gemini \
  --model gemini-2.5-pro \
  --regime abstain \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --repeat_fakes 4 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --note_order shuffle \
  --out_jsonl out/gemini_25pro_taskB_abstain_r4.jsonl


python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend gemini \
  --model gemini-2.5-pro \
  --regime abstain \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --repeat_fakes 1 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --note_order shuffle \
  --out_jsonl out/gemini_25pro_taskB_abstain_r1.jsonl


##model gpt-5##  
python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend GPT \
  --model gpt-5 \
  --regime forced \
  --repeat_fakes 4 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --note_order shuffle \
  --out_jsonl out/GPT5_taskB_forced_r4.jsonl
  
python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend GPT \
  --model gpt-5 \
  --regime abstain \
  --repeat_fakes 4 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\

python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend GPT \
  --model gpt-5 \
  --regime forced \
  --repeat_fakes 1 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --note_order shuffle \
  --task_name TaskB \
  --out_jsonl out/GPT5_taskB_forced_r1.jsonl
  

python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend GPT \
  --model gpt-5 \
  --regime abstain \
  --repeat_fakes 1 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --note_order shuffle \
  --task_name TaskB \
  --out_jsonl out/GPT5_taskB_abstain_r1.jsonl
  
  
##model Qwen## 
  python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend hf \
  --model Qwen/Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct \
  --regime abstain \
  --note_order shuffle \
  --repeat_fakes 1 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --out_jsonl Qwen_taskB_abstain_r1.jsonl
  
  python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend hf \
  --model Qwen/Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct \
  --regime abstain \
  --note_order shuffle \
  --repeat_fakes 4 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --out_jsonl Qwen_taskB_abstain_r4.jsonl

  python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend hf \
  --model Qwen/Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct \
  --regime forced \
  --note_order shuffle \
  --repeat_fakes 1 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\

  python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend hf \
  --model Qwen/Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct \
  --regime forced \
  --note_order shuffle \
  --repeat_fakes 4 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --out_jsonl Qwen_taskB_forced_r4.jsonl



##model Mistral## 
  python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend hf \
  --model mistralai/Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2 \
  --regime abstain \
  --note_order shuffle \
  --repeat_fakes 1 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --out_jsonl Mistral_taskB_abstain_r1.jsonl
  
  python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend hf \
  --model mistralai/Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2 \
  --regime abstain \
  --note_order shuffle \
  --repeat_fakes 4 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
  --out_jsonl Mistral_taskB_abstain_r4.jsonl
  
  python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend hf \
  --model mistralai/Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2 \
  --regime forced \
  --note_order shuffle \
  --repeat_fakes 1 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\

##model Llama##   
python hallucination_evaluation.py \
  --backend hf \
  --model meta-llama/Llama-3.1-8B-Instruct \
  --regime abstain \
  --note_order shuffle \
  --repeat_fakes 1 \
  --fake_ks 0,1,2,4,8,16,32 \
  --seeds 1232009098,308781563,1822204440,1856275569,1556939350,511992535,1573242820,1974204077,909045218,1027757427,356097072,339628201,1725040174,987944399,483674972,444747365,1148999482,1012989931,1577632072,2051959777,155757830,1900916679,1686940148,308602141,607294354,124485987,532967776,1903146521,107108062,1007341759,1324303244,1287428821,2033779434,656783835,68357240,649662289,1226597302,473700535,1772648484,1630424973,1359152450,1022331219,923202192,926766985,851456910,425682863,2140186556,1528488773,1209006746,2051329995,1218347944,864775873,409151078,818847143,304886356,1964979709,1600865010,138243395,1044651968,321795321,1885772862,893360799,53180396,1150560181,36453962,1594704315,1414407896,405572145,804779286,507788951,1844107396,1427019885,989220002,226766131,1870592240,579423849,1485869294,1204447631,821212188,870279205,427347450,1888358315,1048901128,1942184353,896913350,563870599,662137524,1804826333,1206854226,1521666339,192577056,1649779673,1228476830,1323226239,316234828,1869849749,1352706474,731265435,1030091064,2100753681\
